short_summary: Multiple parts to be sourced from Canada and abroad, requiring delivery to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt
description: Details and description of items requested by Defence for sourcing from industry and delivery to Defence Establishments. Specifications include NIBS classification, NSN and part numbers. Well-sourced products and aggressive delivery timelines are preferred.
duration_in_months: > 12 (Collection Period Subject to Continuity Provision Maximum)
full_summary:
====================

**Multiple VICTORIA Class Spares: Power Supply, Transmitter, Circuit Card Assembly**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Announcement**
-----------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for the supply of various spares and components for the VICTORIA Class submarines. The procurement is for the following items:

* 20 Transducers (Motional Pickup)
	+ Quantity: 10 units to CFB Esquimalt, 10 units to CFB Halifax
* 1000 Lamps (Incandescent)
	+ Quantity: 500 units to CFB Esquimalt, 500 units to CFB Halifax
* 100 Semiconductor Device Assemblies
	+ Quantity: 50 units to CFB Esquimalt, 50 units to CFB Halifax
* 4 Transmitters (Pressure)
	+ Quantity: 2 units to CFB Esquimalt, 2 units to CFB Halifax
* 20 Power Supplies
	+ Quantity: 10 units to CFB Esquimalt, 10 units to CFB Halifax
* 20 Circuit Card Assemblies
	+ Quantity: 10 units to CFB Esquimalt, 10 units to CFB Halifax
* 12 Computer Subassemblies
	+ Quantity: 6 units to CFB Esquimalt, 6 units to CFB Halifax

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* Contract Type: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Delivery Address: CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
* Start Date: October 1, 2024
* End Date: September 30, 2025
* Language: English or French

**Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------

* Technical capability and qualifications of the bidder
* Price and pricing strategy
* Past performance and experience

**Notices and Documents**
-------------------------

* Tender Notice: [link to tender notice on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website]
* RFP Document: [link to RFP document on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website]
